descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Damian Lillard uses a series of jab steps to create space before knocking down a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard drills step-back 3 from the corner) 2021/12/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard drills step-back 3 from the corner

videos.description: Damian Lillard absorbs contact and still gets his acrobatic layup to drop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dame somehow gets tough and-1 to fall) 2021/12/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dame somehow gets tough and-1 to fall

videos.description: The Trail Blazers forget to guard Kristaps Porzingis, who easily drains a shot from beyond the arc.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porzingis makes Blazers pay for leaving him wide open) 2021/12/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porzingis makes Blazers pay for leaving him wide open

videos.description: Josh Green throws down a powerful dunk in transition as the Mavericks' lead balloons to 16 points.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Josh Green reaches back for big slam) 2021/12/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Josh Green reaches back for big slam

videos.description: Brandon Knight feeds a cutting Kristaps Porzingis for an and-1 jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porzingis drops the hammer on the Blazers) 2021/12/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porzingis drops the hammer on the Blazers
